channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Toilet block left after roadworks - works finished over a week ago and toilet still, 15th July
item.description:
Outside 28 Leckhampton Road, Cheltenham. GL53 0BB. Roadworks finished over a week ago - toilet still on pavement right outside our house.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Croft Lane, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Signs & Barriers left behind by Contractor

item.title: Water does not run away. It just pulls in one place and does not go towards the Drain., 15th July
item.description:
Water pools in this one spot right next to pedestrian crossing and catches pedestrians when they walk around the corner and get splashed very considerably due to the depth of the water the water does not run towards the drain. It runs away from the drain and also when it is dry, the road is cracked

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 64, Hewlett Road, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Leaves &mould need removal, 15th July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bayshill Road, Montpellier, Cheltenham

item.title: Parabola Road TJuction needs resurfacing., 15th July

item.title: One side dying and tree leaning towards my property, 15th July

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 15th July
item.description:
Give and take 28 days with temporary footway closure required footway abrupt level different please remove x1 raised 600x600x20mm slab and replace with tarmac due to tree roots damage tarmac patch number 2 (FW6 Abrupt Level Differences)
Report on FixMyStreet
